answers.author: William Underwood
answers.text:
As I recall, the City of Stuart leased out space on the water tower, and I think Jupiter worked on a monopole in a recreation field.

author: Frank Thomas
text: Does anyone have a request for proposals or bid for leasing out space on municipal elevated water towers for antenna?
title: Cell phone/broadband antenna leases on elevated municipal water towers
